lead_paragraph: A judge on Monday again denied a request by the Detroit Public Schools to obtain a temporary restraining order for teacher “sickouts” that have closed dozens of buildings this month.
snippet: A judge on Monday again denied a request by the Detroit Public Schools to obtain a temporary restraining order for teacher “sickouts” that have closed dozens of buildings this month.
abstract: Michigan State Judge Cynthia Stephens denies second request from Detroit Public Schools  for temporary restraining order against teacher sickouts, which have closed dozens of schools; teacher strikes are illegal in Michigan, but judge rules district did not provide enough evidence to prove sickouts were intentional.
